list.name: apigee-service
list.query: select stdout, action, component, value from "apigee-service" where $timeFilter and region = '$region' and ( pod = '$mppod' or pod = '$rtpod' ) and component =~ /edge.*/ and action != 'environment'

targets.query: SELECT min("up") FROM "heartbeats" WHERE "service" =~ /.*router/ AND "dpcolor" =~ /^$color$/ AND "pod" =~ /^$rtpod$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "release", "host", "pod", "dpcolor" fill(0)

SELECT min("up") FROM "heartbeats" WHERE "service" =~ /.*message-processor/ AND "dpcolor" =~ /^$color$/ AND "pod" =~ /^$mppod$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "pod", "dpcolor", "service" fill(0)

SELECT min("up") FROM "heartbeats" WHERE "service" =~ /.*message-processor/ AND "dpcolor" =~ /^$color$/ AND "pod" =~ /^$mppod$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "pod", "dpcolor", "service" fill(0)

SELECT mean("rate") FROM "upstream_apigee_errors" WHERE "dpcolor" =~ /^$color$/ AND "org" =~ /^$org$/ AND "env" =~ /^$env$/ AND "region" = '$region' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "dpcolor", "host" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("apigee_errors"), 1s) FROM "faults" WHERE "dpcolor" =~ /^$color$/ AND "org" =~ /^$org$/ AND "env" =~ /^$env$/ AND region= '$region' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "dpcolor", "host", "proxy" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("policy_errors"), 1s) FROM "faults" WHERE "dpcolor" =~ /^$color$/ AND "org" =~ /^$org$/ AND "env" =~ /^$env$/ AND region= '$region' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "dpcolor", "host", "proxy" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("target_errors"), 1s) FROM "faults" WHERE "dpcolor" =~ /^$color$/ AND "org" =~ /^$org$/ AND "env" =~ /^$env$/ AND region= '$region' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "dpcolor", "host", "proxy" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("200"), 1s) FROM "vhost" WHERE "dpcolor" =~ /^$color$/ AND "org" =~ /^$org$/ AND "env" =~ /^$env$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s), "host"
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("201"), 1s) FROM "vhost" WHERE "dpcolor" =~ /^$color$/ AND "org" =~ /^$org$/ AND "env" =~ /^$env$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s),"host"
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("202"), 1s) FROM "vhost" WHERE "dpcolor" =~ /^$color$/ AND "org" =~ /^$org$/ AND "env" =~ /^$env$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s),"host"
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("302"), 1s) FROM "vhost" WHERE "dpcolor" =~ /^$color$/ AND "org" =~ /^$org$/ AND "env" =~ /^$env$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s), "host"
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("400"), 1s) FROM "vhost" WHERE "dpcolor" =~ /^$color$/ AND "org" =~ /^$org$/ AND "env" =~ /^$env$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s),"host"
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("500"), 1s) FROM "vhost" WHERE "dpcolor" =~ /^$color$/ AND "org" =~ /^$org$/ AND "env" =~ /^$env$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s),"host"
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("502"), 1s) FROM "vhost" WHERE "dpcolor" =~ /^$color$/ AND "org" =~ /^$org$/ AND "env" =~ /^$env$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s),"host"
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("total"), 1s)/2 FROM "proxy" WHERE "dpcolor" =~ /^$color$/ AND "org" =~ /^$org$/ AND "env" =~ /^$env$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s), "host", "proxy"
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("total"), 1s) FROM "target" WHERE "dpcolor" =~ /^$color$/ AND "org" =~ /^$org$/ AND "env" =~ /^$env$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s), "target"
SELECT mean("avg_latency") FROM "target" WHERE "dpcolor" =~ /^$color$/ AND "org" =~ /^$org$/ AND "env" =~ /^$env$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "target", "proxy"
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("2xx"), 1s)/2  FROM "proxy" WHERE "dpcolor" =~ /^$color$/ AND "org" =~ /^$org$/ AND "env" =~ /^$env$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s), "host", "proxy"
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("3xx"), 1s)/2 FROM "proxy" WHERE "dpcolor" =~ /^$color$/ AND "org" =~ /^$org$/ AND "env" =~ /^$env$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s), "host", "proxy"
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("4xx"), 1s)/2 FROM "proxy" WHERE "dpcolor" =~ /^$color$/ AND "org" =~ /^$org$/ AND "env" =~ /^$env$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s),"host", "proxy"
SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("5xx"), 1s)/2 FROM "proxy" WHERE "dpcolor" =~ /^$color$/ AND "org" =~ /^$org$/ AND "env" =~ /^$env$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s),"host", "proxy"
SELECT "avg_latency" FROM "proxy" WHERE "dpcolor" =~ /^$color$/ AND "org" =~ /^$org$/ AND "env" =~ /^$env$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "target", "proxy"
SELECT mean("count") FROM "threads" WHERE "pod" =~ /^$mppod$/ AND "dpcolor" =~ /^$color$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("accepted") FROM "nio" WHERE "pod" =~ /^$mppod$/ AND "dpcolor" =~ /^$color$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("conn_pending") FROM "nio" WHERE "pod" =~ /^$mppod$/ AND "dpcolor" =~ /^$color$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("connected") FROM "nio" WHERE "pod" =~ /^$mppod$/ AND "dpcolor" =~ /^$color$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("load1") FROM "system" WHERE "dpcolor" =~ /^$color$/ AND region= '$region' AND pod = '$mppod' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "type_instance", "host" fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("packets_recv"), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE $timeFilter AND region= '$region' AND pod = '$mppod' GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(none)
SELECT derivative(mean("packets_sent"), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE $timeFilter AND region= '$region' AND pod = '$mppod' GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(none)
SELECT mean(used) FROM "mem" WHERE $timeFilter AND region= '$region' AND pod = '$mppod' GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT distinct("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE ("pod" =~ /^$rtpod$/ OR "pod" =~ /^$mppod$/) AND "path" = '/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path" fill(null)
SELECT mean("load1") FROM "system" WHERE "dpcolor" =~ /^$color$/ AND region= '$region' AND pod = '$rtpod' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "type_instance", "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_user") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("pod" =~ /^$rtpod$/ OR "pod" =~ /^$mppod$/) AND "dpcolor" =~ /^$color$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_guest") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("pod" =~ /^$rtpod$/ OR "pod" =~ /^$mppod$/ ) AND "dpcolor" =~ /^$color$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT distinct("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE ("pod" =~ /^$rtpod$/ OR "pod" =~ /^$mppod$/) AND "path" = '/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path" fill(null)

list.label: Color
list.name: color
list.query: show tag values from heartbeats with key = "dpcolor" where region =~ /$region/

list.label: Org
list.name: org
list.query: show tag values from proxy with key = "org" where region =~ /$region/

list.label: Env
list.name: env
list.query: show tag values from proxy with key = "env" WHERE org =~ /$org/ and region =~ /$region/

list.label: MPPod
list.name: mppod
list.query: show tag values from proxy with key = "pod" WHERE org = '$org' and env = '$env' and region = '$region'

list.label: RTPod
list.name: rtpod
list.query: show tag values from proxy with key = "pod" WHERE org =~ /$org/ and env =~ /$env/ and region =~ /$region/
